verbose_text: Complete protection was not seen with any of the antioxidants used in this study; however, pretreatment with DMU and DMSO significantly reduced the prolongation of action potential duration and the inhibition of the outward K + current, while mannitol did not prevent the inhibition of the outward K + current induced by H 2 O 2 / Cu (II).
evidence: DMSO significantly reduced the prolongation of action potential duration
